page.shortlink: tabbed ui properties session timeout warning confirmation button javascript property
page.description: JavaScript that is executed when the user dismisses the "session has expired" message.
page.discussion: If the *[ui:After session timeout action]* is set to 'Nothing', you can specify Javascript to execute when the user closes the session timeout message. To reload the Tabbed UI page, you can use the following placeholder:

description.p: This placeholder is replaced with JavaScript that will reload the page.
